title: Best youtube pvper

replies.body: Jehova is best. Place cptspatklez and those guys down at bottom ;p I'd say avicus, kit PvP and ocn have a lot of good youtuber pvpers too.
replies.body_tagged: Jehova is best. Place cptspatklez and those guys down at bottom ;p I'd say avicus, kit PvP and ocn have a lot of good youtuber pvpers too.

replies.body: Apache, Jtpetino, pmpheys, Cayden and HattoWolf, Unphair,Juan9907 and all of those over pot pvpers are op. I'd also say people like Matsuzen and ZHDeath but their YouTube's are inactive
